actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude $2,000 from the gross income of auxiliary policemen and volunteer firemen.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $2,000 of the compensation received by an auxiliary police officer or volunteer fire fighter.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude $2,000 from the gross income of auxiliary policemen and volunteer firemen.
